name: Physical Therapy
description: Rehabilitation, movement science, and patient recovery

questions.question_text: Describe your approach to initial patient evaluation and treatment planning.
questions.expected_answer: History, examination, diagnosis, prognosis, intervention plan, goals

questions.question_text: How do you modify treatment plans for patients who are not progressing as expected?
questions.expected_answer: Reassessment, goal adjustment, alternative interventions, referral

questions.question_text: Explain the principles of therapeutic exercise prescription.
questions.expected_answer: Overload principle, specificity, progression, frequency, intensity, duration

questions.question_text: Tell me about a challenging patient case and how you managed it.
questions.expected_answer: Clinical reasoning, creative problem-solving, patient communication, outcome

questions.question_text: How do you approach pain management using physical therapy modalities?
questions.expected_answer: Evidence-based modalities, manual therapy, exercise, patient education

questions.question_text: What is your experience with post-surgical rehabilitation protocols?
questions.expected_answer: Protocol adherence, phase progression, precautions, return-to-function criteria

questions.question_text: How do you educate patients about their home exercise programs?
questions.expected_answer: Demonstration, written instructions, compliance strategies, follow-up

questions.question_text: Describe your experience with neurological rehabilitation.
questions.expected_answer: Stroke rehab, neuroplasticity, functional training, balance, gait training

questions.question_text: How do you use outcome measures to track patient progress?
questions.expected_answer: Standardized tools, MCID, functional outcome measures, documentation

questions.question_text: What is your approach to treating chronic low back pain?
questions.expected_answer: Biopsychosocial model, exercise therapy, manual therapy, education

questions.question_text: How do you handle a patient who is non-compliant with their treatment plan?
questions.expected_answer: Motivational interviewing, barrier identification, goal modification

questions.question_text: Describe your experience with aquatic therapy.
questions.expected_answer: Buoyancy principles, pool protocols, indications, contraindications

questions.question_text: How do you stay current with evidence-based practice in physical therapy?
questions.expected_answer: Journals, CPGs, continuing education, professional development

questions.question_text: Explain your approach to sports injury rehabilitation.
questions.expected_answer: Phase-based rehab, return-to-sport criteria, functional testing

questions.question_text: How do you assess and treat balance disorders?
questions.expected_answer: Balance assessment tools, vestibular rehab, fall prevention strategies

questions.question_text: What documentation practices do you follow for insurance and compliance?
questions.expected_answer: Skilled care documentation, functional goals, progress notes, compliance

questions.question_text: How do you collaborate with other healthcare providers in patient care?
questions.expected_answer: Communication, referrals, shared goals, multidisciplinary approach

questions.question_text: Describe your experience with geriatric rehabilitation.
questions.expected_answer: Age-related considerations, fall prevention, functional independence

questions.question_text: How do you assess and treat shoulder impingement syndrome?
questions.expected_answer: Special tests, rotator cuff strengthening, scapular stabilization, posture

questions.question_text: What is your experience with telehealth in physical therapy?
questions.expected_answer: Virtual assessments, exercise guidance, technology use, limitations
